Posts.EditableText:
Hi, 

I am looking to start a serious project, but I don’t know coding and instead of fumbling my way through it I’d rather see if there are any programmers on this site that would like to be my partner and to have their name as co-developer for this game. 

I wasn’t sure where would be the best place on this site to ask so I went with the general forums since this isn’t a post directly about game design itself.

Hi,

Posts.EditableText:
What kind of project?

You might want to try getting people excited about your idea, so they have a reason to be interested.

Posts.EditableText: I can help, but I have no time to be a full partner. I am also not  a programmer, I just started developing my games 1 or 2 years ago, I am still learning.
